mapper.select: SELECT bld_no, slip_no, slip_detail_no, DATE_FORMAT(deal_date, '%Y-%m-%d') deal_date, cnt_cls, (select cd_nm from tb_comm_code t4 where t4.bld_no = bld_no and cd_id_nm = 'TAX_CLS' and cd_vld_val = tax_cls) tax_cls, deal_type, deal_cust, deal_dtls, (select CODE_NM from tb_account t1 where t1.bld_no = bld_no and CODE_ID = acnt_lclas) acnt_lclas, (select CODE_NM from tb_account t2 where t2.bld_no = bld_no and CODE_ID = acnt_mlsfc) acnt_mlsfc, (select CODE_NM from tb_account t3 where t3.bld_no = bld_no and CODE_ID = acnt_sclas) acnt_sclas, suply_price, splpc_am, vat, use_yn, register, up_datetime FROM tb_slip WHERE bld_no = #{bldNo} AND deal_date = #{dealDate}
